imm_ptl.generating_new_frame: 未找到现成传送门框架  即将生成新传送门框架
imm_ptl.portal_searching_range: 地狱传送门生成搜索范围
imm_ptl.long_reach_in_creative: 创造模式下触及范围更大
imm_ptl.active_loading: 完全加载仅传送门可视区块
imm_ptl.altius_screen: [空间折叠] 位面纵向堆叠
imm_ptl.lag_attack_proof: 卡顿时限制传送门渲染
imm_ptl.multi_threaded_nether_portal_sea: 多线程传送门框架搜索
imm_ptl.laggy: 由于卡顿，暂时减少传送门渲染 (可设置关闭)
imm_ptl.not_pointing_portal: 你没有将准心指向一个传送门
imm_ptl.not_in_wrapping_zone: 你没有处于任何空间折叠区域内
imm_ptl.removed_invalid_wrapping_portals: 已移除异常空间折叠传送门 %1$s
imm_ptl.cannot_find_zone: 无法找到该空间折叠区域
imm_ptl.needs_pehkui: 由于未安装Pehkui，玩家的大小没有变化
imm_ptl.indirect_loading_radius_cap: 间接区块加载最大半径
imm_ptl.reduced_portal_rendering: 限制性传送门渲染（提高帧率）
imm_ptl.loose_movement_check: 取消玩家位置反作弊检测（可以减少网络卡顿时的传送）
imm_ptl.visibility_prediction: 渲染时预测传送门是否可见
imm_ptl.dim_stack_initialized: [空间折叠]已生成位面纵向堆叠世界
imm_ptl.inform_wiki: [空间折叠] 如何制作自定义传送门：
imm_ptl.clear_border_warning:
注意! 即将清除折叠区域外部边界的所有方块。
此操作无法撤销，建议提前备份存档
 此操作将生成世界区块，增加存档大小约 %1$s GB.
再次使用这个命令以继续
imm_ptl.finished_clearing_border: 已完成外部边界清除 方块更新可能未同步到客户端，重新进入世界以查看
imm_ptl.inform_portal_helper: [空间折叠] 查看如何使用传送门框架
imm_ptl.portal_helper_tooltip: 建造两个框架，用打火石点燃
imm_ptl.incompatible_shape: [空间折叠] 无法转换传送门，因为形状不兼容
imm_ptl.enable_nether_portal_overlay: 启用地狱传送门外附材质
imm_ptl.optifine_warning: [Immersive Portals] You are using OptiFine with Immersive Portals. Portal rendering artefacts may appear.
imm_ptl.stagnate_movement: 传送门另一侧区块未加载，暂停运动
imm_ptl.portal_helper_tooltip2: Remove the portal using command /portal eradicate_portal_clutter
imm_ptl.memory_not_enough: [Immersive Portals] Memory seems not enough. If you experience GC lag, try to shrink render distance or allocate more memory.
imm_ptl.command_desc.delete_portal: Delete the one-way one-faced portal component
imm_ptl.command.remove_connected_portals: Make the portal one-way and one-faced
imm_ptl.command.complete_bi_way_bi_faced: Make the portal bi-way and bi-faced
imm_ptl.command_desc.move_portal_front: Along the direction that you are looking at
imm_ptl.command_desc.move_portal_back: Along the direction that you are looking at
imm_ptl.command_desc.move_portal_destina: Along the direction that you are looking at
Along the direction that you are looking at
imm_ptl.command_desc.goback: Return to the last entered portal
